description:
Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Dish Soap is rich, thick and makes grease disappear like nobody's business. This concentrated liquid dish formula for hand washing dishes and pots and pans includes Soap Bark Extract, another ingredient from the garden that is one of nature's best degreasers. The formula is biodegradable, contains plant-derived ingredients and rinses clean. All you need is a squirt or two and you're on your way.

DIRECTIONS FOR USE: A squirt or two of Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Liquid Dish Soap in a sink full of warm water cuts grease and keeps dishes clean and bright.

USES: Q. Is your Dish Soap safe for grey water systems? A. Our Dish Soap is appropriate for grey water systems Q. Is your Dish Soap a pH neutral product? A. Yes. Our Dish Soap does have a neutral pH.

Our innovative, foaming technology with dual cleaning agents saves time, needs less water for washing and rinses free. Whether it’s baby, family or dinner party dishes (remember dinner parties?), this is the answer to one of your burning questions.

description:
Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Dish Soap is rich, thick and makes grease disappear like nobody's business. This concentrated liquid dish formula for hand washing dishes and pots and pans includes Soap Bark Extract, another ingredient from the garden that is one of nature's best degreasers. The formula is biodegradable, contains plant-derived ingredients and rinses clean. All you need is a squirt or two and you're on your way.

DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Be sure to load dishes neatly. Place one pack into your dishwasher's soap cup. Do not unwrap the pack and make certain your hands are dry before handling. Remember to reseal the bag after use. These packs work wonderfully in regular machines and fancy European models. Not only are they convenient, they also pack a punch when it comes to removing coffee and tea stains - without nasty phosphates or chlorine!

USES: Q. Can I use the Automatic Dish Packs to clean my fine china? A.. Our Automatic Dish Packs are safe to use when washing china, provided your china does not have a gilded metal on it. Due to the high pH level, our Automatic Dishwashing Detergent could discolor or remove the metal from dishware.

description:
Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Dish Soap is rich, thick and makes grease disappear like nobody's business. This concentrated liquid dish formula for hand washing dishes, pots and pans includes Soap Bark Extract, another ingredient from the garden that is one of nature's best degreasers. The formula is biodegradable, contains plant-derived ingredients and rinses clean. All you need is a squirt or two and you're on your way.

DIRECTIONS FOR USE: A squirt or two of Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Liquid Dish Soap in a sink full of warm water cuts grease and keeps dishes clean and bright.

USES: Appropriate for grey water systems.
